content: Diagnostic technology company Qiagen NV will try to persuade the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit on Thursday to throw out an injunction barring the sale of its year-old GeneReader  the company's entry into the rapidly growing gene-sequencing market.
name: Qiagen NV
title: Illumina  Qiagen to square off over GeneReader ban
